media:group.media:title: Detective Diaries | QnA! Meet the Team ðŸ˜Ž
media:group.media:description:
My, my, my goodness!! I didn't think there'd be so many people!! Thank you everyone for joining us, we couldn't ask for anything more!

This project has been quite the journey, taking over 10 months to complete... Me and the team will be talking about that today, along with many other things! Feel free to ask us questions, and we can talk and chat about anything ðŸ˜Ž

We're glad you're here to see the development of Crash Landing Studios. Stick around for more, as more shall come!

Website, for our projects and artworks!
https://crashlandingstudios.com

Twitter, to keep up to date!
https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio

Discord, if you'd like to chat with us!
https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2

See you soon!
